author: Gregor Kiczales
title: PS1 Q6 Ambiguity
question: The question does not specify ...  How should we handle this ambiguity?
student_answer: Mentioned in the lecture today was that throughout the design process we have to make judgement calls such as these.
instructor_answer: Problem statements in real life are often ambiguous.  You should resolve it in a reasonable way. Of which there are only a small number of choices.
